Can cast Crown Heal, healing all nearby friendly units by <AIdb,DataB1>, restoring their mana by <AIdb,DataC1>, and increasing their armor by <AIdb,DataA1> for <AIdb,Dur1> seconds.|n|cffffcc00Lore|r|n|cffffdeadFavored item of choice by Azshara herself, this specially infused trinket was a gift from Sargeras to ensure the admiration of the Queen.|r
